page.title: 07Tairmeibion Farm
page.content: Something which is important to note is the predominance of Welsh speaking people within the farming area in and around Bangor and in Gwynedd itself.The majority of farmers and many people in Gwynedd speak and use Welsh as their first language.The Welsh language has historically developed from a strong agricultural background and has become the primary medium for discussing matters relating to the land and the Welsh environment.Indeed there are some words such as "Cynhefin"(in English, meaning niche,homeground,etc) which cannot be adequately translated into English.There are many Welsh expressions and terminologies which enhance the need to retain a knowledge of the language since they often refer specifically to the character of an agricultural locality.
